This page is about '''planned versions''' of all editions of ''[[Minecraft]]''. These updates either have major sources to their existence or have received development versions.

Only editions with known planned updates are listed here; if no known planned updates exist, the edition is left out.<!-- DO NOT ADD UNSOURCED INFORMATION — Do not assume information that has not been directly stated. -->
<!-- Do not add bug fixes from development versions. -->

== ''Java Edition '' ==

=== 26.1 ===
{{main|Java Edition 26.1}}
26.1 is a game drop with no set release date, which adds new baby mob models, makes name tags craftable, fixes bugs and allows for custom [[villager trades]] to be added through [[data packs]].

== ''Bedrock Edition'' ==
=== 26.0 ===
{{main|Bedrock Edition 26.0}}
26.0 is a minor update with no set release date, which adds experimental features for the [[First Drop 2026|first drop of 2026]], which adds new textures for baby mobs, new models, animations, and sounds for rabbits, [[closed captions]], [[parties]], and fixes bugs.

=== 26.10 ===
26.10 is a game drop with no set release date, which adds new baby mob models, redesigns rabbits, and makes name tags craftable.

== ''Minecraft Education'' ==
=== 1.21.131 ===
{{main|Minecraft Education 1.21.131}}

1.21.131 is a minor update set to release in January 2026, which adds features from the [[The Copper Age]] and [[Mounts of Mayhem]] drop.<ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>
